longerStay.print: You: Hello! Welcome back to the Three Eagles Hotel!
Dylan: Hey, could I extend my booking? This cute little hotel is actually pretty cozy.
You: Sure, how many days would you like to add on?
Dylan: Just until the end of the week. I have a friend in town that I’m gonna visit!
You: Sounds good! You’re all set. Is there anything else you need?
Dylan: A quick question on the pricing - any chance
a longer stay gives me a discount or anything?

longerStay_yes.print: You: We do indeed! It’s a 10% total discount if you stay more than 3 nights.
Dylan: Oh, okay! Your eyes are free like the ocean...
You: Uh... Did you want any shampoo?

longerStay_no.print: No, sorry! We do have different free items from day to day, though.
Dylan: Oh, okay! Your eyes are free like the ocean...
You: Uh... Did you want any shampoo?

Dylan: There are some strange noises coming from the room beside me...

Dylan: Just a bunch of things I can only describe as a young female voice

You: I don’t have a little horse...
You: Plus we’re in the middle of the desert.
Dylan: Anyways, I was looking for some extra pillows.

Dylan: To make a long story short...
Dylan: This place is really growing on me.
Dylan: It reminds me of my adventures down under.

Dylan: ...staying when I want to go to Denmark...

Dylan: Anyways I don’t want to beat a dead horse.
Dylan: Let me know if you hear of any job openings.
Dylan: Or maybe you want to spread your wings, and join me when I leave.
Dylan: The ball is in your court.

leave_no.print: Dylan: We could have had a bright future together...
Dylan: Good look out there then.

read.print: Dylan: Just feeling a little slow is all.
Dylan: Anyways, are there any places for where I could read up on the old newspapers in the town?

read_a.print: You: Well, there’s an old library down the road.
Dylan: Thanks homie, you’re always helpful.
Dylan: We need more people like you in the world.

read_b.print: You: Well, there’s the good ol’ town hall.
Dylan: But don’t they just have like, official record books?

Dylan: Welp, thanks for the suggestion anyways.
Dylan: I guess I’ll take a look around the block.
